column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Anyways.  I went for lunch last Friday.  We shared the fried oysters and I had the Hot Brown
column2: an homage to the Louisville tradition. The fried Oyster were weird
column3: all of the oysters were attached and kind of clumped together. The comeback sauce was decent.  Then I had the Hot Brown.  It came on a plate that was very hard to eat it on
column4: but this was not the largest problem.  This was gross.  There was fat or skin or something that made it very difficult to eat and honestly half way through I just stopped eating it.  I ended having to spit out a several bites as they were inedible. The bread was overdone so hard to cut.  The sauce was okay
column5: but that is all I can say that I liked.
